name: Total and federally financed higher education R&D expenditures passed through to subrecipients, by state, institutional control, and institution: FY 2023
description: Total and federally financed higher education R&D expenditures passed through to subrecipients, by state, institutional control, and institution: FY 2023

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: _b_state_institutional_control_and_institution_b
variableMeasured.description: State, institutional control, and institution hierarchy

variableMeasured.name: field_total_all_r_d_expenditures_passed_through
variableMeasured.description: Total All R D Expenditures Passed Through

variableMeasured.name: field_federally_financed_all_r_d_expenditures_passed_through
variableMeasured.description: Federally Financed All R D Expenditures Passed Through

variableMeasured.name: field_federally_financed_to_higher_education_subrecipients
variableMeasured.description: Federally Financed To Higher Education Subrecipients

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: This table includes only institutions reporting $1 million or more in total R&D expenditures in 2022. Institutions reporting less than $1 million in total R&D expenditures in 2022 completed a shorter version of the survey form in FY 2023, and that form requested R&D expenditures passed through only to higher education institutions. For a list of R&D expenditures passed through to higher education institutions at institutions completing the shorter version of the survey, see table 86.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Higher Education Research and Development Survey, FY 2023.
